alert.note: Alert for Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:55AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tippah, southern Tishomingo and Prentiss Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jumpertown, or 7 miles west of Booneville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Jumpertown, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Burton, Midway, Wheeler, Marietta, Golden, Paden, Thrasher, Dennis, Gaston, Carter Branch, Holcut, Geeville and Hobo Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
